dict.string: We have decided to consolidate our EASe apps into one. It is now free to download. To continue receiving updates and improvements, we switch our PRO features to a subscription based program. This allows us to focus on the PRO needs and enable new features and enhancements specifically for therapists. The current EASe PRO app you are using will continue to work but will not be updated anymore. So there is no rush to switch over but be aware that there are no updates coming for this app anymore.
